help.model: choices: tiny, base, small, medium, large. large is always multilingual
help.multilingual: don't use the english only model.
help.mic_energy_min: threshold for audio to be recorded. too low is bad.
help.record_timeout: time in seconds before silence triggers stop recording chunk
help.phrase_timeout: time in seconds before silence triggers chunks to be output as phrase
help.mic_device: default microphone name for SpeechRecognition. options are listed at startup.

help.robotize_voice: apply post processing to tts to add robotic distortion
help.voice_name: Voice name from aws polly. Matthew, Justin,...
